name: ZRevolution
description:
Your own military who swore to protect their citizens are attacking you. People have to grab whatever they can and fight back the brutal coup. You as a player manage a team of heroes each with their own unique skills. Your objective is to stop and fight back the attackers trying crack down the peaceful protests.

အရေးတော်ပုံ အောင်ရမည်!

GameDev Strike from a team of GenZ

GenZ လူငယ်တစ်ဖွဲ့မှ GameDev သပိတ်
